content: This is an unacceptable breach of Purple's sovereignty. We strongly condemn your aggression and urge an immediate cessation of hostilities.
We stand with you at this time and are coordinating international opposition to Orange's actions. Let's work together for peace.
Green calls upon the international community to uphold territorial integrity and solve disputes through diplomacy and law.
Green calls for an immediate ceasefire and peaceful negotiations between Purple and Orange. Further violence will only lead to more suffering.
We continue to stand with you and believe diplomacy and de-escalation are the paths forward. Let us know how we can assist negotiations.
Green reiterates the need for all parties to cease hostilities and pursue mediated negotiations. There are no military solutions to this crisis, only diplomatic ones.
We continue to support your sovereignty and territorial integrity. Please let us know if we can assist with diplomatic negotiations in any way.
We strongly urge you to cease your aggression in Purple, which threatens regional stability. Let us open a dialogue on addressing your security concerns through peaceful means.
Green calls upon all parties to immediately cease hostilities and pursue good faith negotiations. The world is watching.
We continue to support your territorial integrity and sovereignty. Please inform us if there are ways we can assist negotiations.
Cease your aggression in Purple immediately. Return to the negotiating table so that peace may prevail.
We applaud your continued commitment to territorial integrity and de-escalation. Let us know how we can assist negotiations and restoring regional stability.
We again urge you to pursue diplomatic solutions and fully withdraw forces from Purple's territory. This is the only path to lasting regional peace and stability.

Green believes the world must unite to uphold sovereignty, international law, and the peaceful resolution of disputes. We call on all parties to exercise maximum restraint and return to the negotiating table.
